group_1.textLeft: …The heck did Yozuru go?@Said she had to do somethin' and just left.
If we don't get in line soon,@they're gonna run outta takoyaki...

group_1.textRight: … Ah, Teacher.@Weren't you going to buy takoyaki?

group_1.textLeft: …'Bout time ya showed up.@You sure kept me waitin'.
[chara:104101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]…'Ey, what's with the swimsuit?!
You're puttin' in a lotta effort for@just goin' out for takoyaki.

group_1.textRight: Takoyaki…?

group_1.textLeft: Ain't that why you came with me?
I thought ya were taggin' along 'cause@you wanted some too...

group_1.textRight: No, I'm here to practice the kindness@you've taught me.
I thought that a change of pace from@my usual environment might prove useful.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, gotcha.
Well, guess I'll be here gettin' myself@somethin' to eat...
So you go on ahead and do what@ya need to do.

group_1.textRight: Alright. Thank you very much.

group_1.textCenter: (Now that I have learned so much from you...)
(...I can be kinder to people I am unfamiliar with,@and form better relationships with them…!)

group_1.textRight: Oh, p-please look out!
I-I'm so sorry!@I was in a hurry...

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry; it's alright.

group_1.textRight: N-now if you'll excuse me…@[chara:800100:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:800100:effect_shake]…Nnh!

group_1.textLeft: Oh dear, your leg is bleeding.
(If you find someone who is injured…)
(The kind thing to do is tend to them@to the best of your ability…!)
Young miss, there's a wash station just@over there. Let's get you cleaned up.

group_1.textCenter: Please hold on tight to me.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]…Eep! Wh-what are…?!
(I…I can't believe she carried me@like a bride…)

group_1.textLeft: Hm… The wound doesn't appear to be@too deep. Let's rinse it out first.
…Are you referring to me?

group_1.textRight: Wait, looking at you closer―@You're actually a beautiful woman!
C'mon, lady, we were goin' after@that girl first.
Uh, um...these guys have been@hitting on me nonstop.

group_1.textLeft: (I see… She ran into me because she was@busy trying to get away from them…)
(I'll get her out of trouble.@That's the kind thing to do…!)
… I'll take care of this.@You should go, young miss.

group_1.textRight: O-okay…!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:800500:effect_shake][chara:800100:effect_shake]Whoops, you ain't going anywhere!
Yo, I think I broke a bone when@I bumped into you.

group_1.textRight: You're gonna have to pay him back for this.

group_1.textLeft: (If you find someone who is injured,@then, to the best of your ability…)
…Fractured bones are beyond@my expertise.
I'll take you to the beach house,@and we can call an ambulance from there.

group_1.textCenter: I'm going to carry you bridal-style.@Please hold still.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800500:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh?!
L-let me go! What the hell are you doing?!

group_1.textLeft: Now, to call an ambulance...

group_1.textRight: Th-the hell's your deal?!@You're way too strong for a woman…!
His, uh, fracture just healed!@So we're gonna hit the road…!

group_1.textLeft: His fracture...healed?

group_1.textRight: U-um… Thank you so much…!
You saved my life!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, think nothing of it.

group_1.textRight: See you later!

group_1.textLeft: (I'm not quite sure what happened,@but I suppose that issue is resolved.)
(I think…)
Well, damn, Yozuru.
Looks like ya got mixed up in some@pretty nasty business.

group_1.textRight: Hello, Teacher.
I did run into a bit of trouble, but...
I've learned a great deal thanks to you.
For example, carrying someone bridal-style…is a@polite gesture that works for both men and women!

group_1.textLeft: …Come again?

group_1.textRight: From now on, I will endeavor to use@the bridal carry more regularly...

group_1.textLeft: Hang on a sec!
The bridal carry ain't a cure-all,@ya know?
I mean, it don't work that often.

group_1.textRight: …Is that so?@Kindness is a difficult concept to master...

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna have to go over some lessons@with ya when we get home.

group_1.textRight: Understood.
(...I will definitely return to this beach@one day…)
(When that time comes, I will show you@true kindness perfectly…!)
